g1.title: Advanced CLI Framework & Shell Integration
g1.description: Implement comprehensive CLI framework with auto-completion, interactive wizards, plugin system, and shell integration for bash/zsh/fish
features_planned: Auto-completion for bash/zsh/fish with dynamic suggestions
Interactive configuration wizard with guided setup
Plugin system with hot-reloadable extensions
Real-time configuration validation with helpful error messages
CLI usage analytics and optimization suggestions
Configuration migration tools between versions
Embedded documentation system with examples

g2.title: Development Environment & Live Reload
g2.description: Implement development environment with live reload, debugging tools, performance profiling, and real-time collaboration features
features_planned: Live reload for development mode with file watching
Built-in debugging tools with step-through execution
Performance profiling integration with flame graphs
Configuration lint with best practices suggestions
Template system for common configuration patterns
Real-time collaboration features for team development
Visual configuration builder with drag-and-drop

g3.title: Code Generation & IDE Integration
g3.description: Implement intelligent code generation, IDE plugins, and framework templates for popular development environments
features_planned: Code generation templates for popular frameworks
Integrated development environment plugins
One-click deployment to multiple platforms
Smart template generation with variables
Natural language to code conversion
Intent classification and entity extraction
Best practices enforcement

g4.title: Testing & Quality Assurance Framework
g4.description: Implement comprehensive testing framework with AI-powered test generation, mutation testing, and quality metrics
features_planned: AI-powered test case generation based on code analysis
Mutation testing for test suite quality validation
Property-based testing for edge case discovery
Visual regression testing for UI components
Chaos engineering integration for resilience testing
Performance prediction modeling based on code changes
Automated test maintenance and refactoring

conflict_avoidance.avoids_a1: Focuses on CLI/DevEx, not infrastructure operations
conflict_avoidance.avoids_a2: Builds on monitoring but focuses on developer tools
conflict_avoidance.avoids_a3: No security overlap - pure developer experience
conflict_avoidance.avoids_a4: Different AI focus - dev tools vs system intelligence
conflict_avoidance.avoids_a5: No platform overlap - focuses on development workflow
